/* Global site tag tool: (google analytics) */export const GA_TRACKING_ID=process.env.REACT_APP_GA_TRACKING_ID||'G-P9YDS7KZPH';//possible types:
export const pageview=url=>{if(GA_TRACKING_ID){window.gtag('config',GA_TRACKING_ID,{page_path:url});}else{console.warn("Google Analytics Tracking ID is missing");}};if(!GA_TRACKING_ID){console.warn("Google Analytics Tracking ID is not defined");}export const event=_ref=>{let{action,category,label,value}=_ref;if(GA_TRACKING_ID){window.gtag('event',action,{event_category:category,event_label:label,value});}else{console.warn("Google Analytics Tracking ID is missing");}};
